mapper.insert: insert into topic(topicid , usersid , courseid , num , contents , addtime ) values(#{topicid} , #{usersid} , #{courseid} , #{num} , #{contents} , #{addtime} )
mapper.select: select a.* , b.username , c.coursename from topic a , users b , course c where a.usersid = b.usersid and a.courseid = c.courseid order by topicid desc
select a.* , b.username , c.coursename from topic a , users b , course c where a.usersid = b.usersid and a.courseid = c.courseid and topicid=#{topicid} order by topicid desc

select a.* , b.username , c.coursename from topic a , users b , course c where a.usersid = b.usersid and a.courseid = c.courseid
and b.username like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{usersid}, '%'))
and c.coursename like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{courseid}, '%'))
and a.num like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{num}, '%'))
and a.contents like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{contents}, '%'))
and a.addtime like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{addtime}, '%'))
